P

pix2ang_nest(long, long) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixToolsNested
Renders theta and phi coordinates of the normal pixel center for the pixel number ipix (NESTED scheme) given the map resolution parameter nside.
pix2ang_ring(long, long) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixTools
renders theta and phi coordinates of the nominal pixel center for the pixel number ipix (RING scheme) given the map resolution parameter nside
pix2vect_nest(long, long) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixToolsNested
renders vector (x,y,z) coordinates of the nominal pixel center for the pixel ipix (NESTED scheme ) given the map resolution parameter nside.
pix2vect_ring(long, long) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixTools
returns the vector pointing in the center of the pixel ipix.
pix2vertex_nest(long, long) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixToolsNested
renders vector (x,y,z) coordinates of the nominal pixel center for the pixel ipix (NESTED scheme ) given the map resolution parameter nside.
pix2vertex_ring(long, long) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixTools
returns double [][] with coordinates of the pixel corners.
pixelize(double) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.Region
divides region on HealPix pixels of given size including pixels that only partly inside the region
PixRes(long) - Method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixTools
calculates angular resolution of the pixel map in arc seconds.
PixTools - Class in org.asterope.healpix
contains methods translated from HEALPix Fortran90 with increased map resolution in comparison to original Fortran code.
PixTools() - Constructor for class org.asterope.healpix.PixTools
default constructor
PixToolsNested - Class in org.asterope.healpix
Contains everything related to nested code.

various utilities not directly related to Healpix.

PixToolsVector3d - Class in org.asterope.healpix
A 3 element vector that is represented by double precision floating point x,y,z coordinates.
PixToolsVector3d(double, double, double) - Constructor for class org.asterope.healpix.PixToolsVector3d
 
PolarToRaDec(double[]) - Static method in class org.asterope.healpix.PixToolsUtils
returns ra, dec in degrees given polar coordinates in radians
